titleStmt.title: On the ever to be lamented death of the most magnanimous and illustrious prince, Charles Leopold Duke of Lorraine, general of the imperial army; who died suddenly, April the eighth 1690

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Baldwin in the Old-Bailey.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Heark! heark! What dismal Noise is this I hear?".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
